column4: Alright I am having some hellacious issues with an ubuntu user who I took on as a project to get his laptop inspiron 1100 up and running with Ubuntu7.04 Feisty Fawn. His graphics card is an intel 82845G/GL[Brookdale-G] /. I have researched for HOURS with nothing to show for all my work. we have checked the gdm logs and the X logs and we keep coming up with an ending error that I CANNOT get past. O have read so many forum posts on
nearly the same problem that I am warn out.  I HAVE rtfm and I have done research. I NEED help. the ending error sometimes (but not of recent) is:I830WaitLpRing()
is this vid card relatively new?
